CustomField.description:
Indicator of guest satisfaction with the service. We don't use the Gues Survey Feedback data because:
-Exists a Master-Detail relationship with the Case object and we don't always have a Case -It's easier to use the information if it's at Service Item level. Because there is no 1-N relation, is just 1-1, there is no need for a separate object
CustomField.label: What could we improve
